Type.Name: MissingFieldException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MissingFieldException extends System.MissingMemberException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when there is an attempt to dynamically access a field that does not exist.

remarks.para: Normally a compilation error is generated if code attempts to access a nonexistent member of a class. is designed to handle cases where an attempt is made to dynamically access a renamed or deleted field of an assembly that is not referenced by its strong name. The is thrown when code in a dependent assembly attempts to access a missing field in an assembly that was modified.

summary.para: Constructs and initializes new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to access a nonexistent field." This message takes into account the current system culture.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .
